ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Georgia
ygData.msgSnippet: Star Wars: Galaxies. My guild has lost more members to this game than any other. Including me. Not saying I ll never go back to EQ, but for now, SWG is my new
ygData.messageBody:
Star Wars: Galaxies.

My guild has lost more members to this game than any
other. Including me.

Not saying I'll never go back to EQ, but for now, SWG
is my new obsession. Tons of fun. :)

--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> Gotta ask. What is SWG?
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson
> <melanie_6602@y...>
> wrote:
> > Hehe, another SWG convert. I haven't picked up EQ
> in
> > about 3 weeks now.
> >
> > Still like reading the EQ sites and getting the
> mail,
> > though. Hard to give up on a game that took up so
> many
> > years of my life. :D
> >
> > Melanie
> >

> live

> it
